<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/2.0/settings/ldap/cron"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns the LDAP autosynchronous cron expression for the current portal if it exists.

  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>
